sections.installation:
1. Upload worst-posts folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. In your “Widget” menu add the widget to your sidebar
  4. enjoy ðŸ™‚
